content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is External Preview?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To improve your collaboration experience with Bloomreach Content, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"External Preview\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a feature that allows you to share your work with others before publishing - including people that \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"don't \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"have a Bloomreach account. This feature enables sharing your pages in your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Channel \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"using a URL.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to enable External Preview\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Open the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Channel\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that contains the page you want to share with your team. Customize your page as you wish to get it ready before sharing by adding some \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Components \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and your content.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":485524,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73e83cb0-c6d1-4cad-8559-241a396ec7e7/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/73e83cb0-c6d1-4cad-8559-241a396ec7e7/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"73e83cb0-c6d1-4cad-8559-241a396ec7e7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.0103759765625,\"height\":572.503954634233},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once your page is ready for sharing, click on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Channel \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"button and then on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Settings \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"as shown below. Turn on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Channel preview\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" with the toggle, which will enable link sharing. Copy the top link to your dashboard, and you are now ready to share the link.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Alternatively, you can use the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Preview\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" button in the top right corner (next to + \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Page\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), which directly takes you to a page preview.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":327777,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0fc1e402-39e4-44a6-86e5-5b977e9a5346/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0fc1e402-39e4-44a6-86e5-5b977e9a5346/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0fc1e402-39e4-44a6-86e5-5b977e9a5346\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.0103759765625,\"height\":482.6994127308239},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please use the Project channel preview URL (the top link), which is meant for end-users. The bottom link is primarily meant for \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://documentation.bloomreach.com/content/docs/external-preview\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"developers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":71773,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/517ca2d8-75de-447e-9619-90f3d4029277/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/517ca2d8-75de-447e-9619-90f3d4029277/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.png\",\"name\":\"Picture3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"517ca2d8-75de-447e-9619-90f3d4029277\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":477,\"height\":600},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heads up!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The preview content is secured only based on access to the code embedded in the URL. Anyone on the internet who knows the URL can access the preview. If this is insufficient for your use case, we recommend against enabling external preview. Instead, each reviewer can be given a user account to access the preview within the Experience manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The screenshot below shows you what the page preview looks like. The link will open up a new window and will be ready to be previewed by your team!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":101250,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c52f8537-41aa-4e55-96f8-ee2adf5793cb/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c52f8537-41aa-4e55-96f8-ee2adf5793cb/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c52f8537-41aa-4e55-96f8-ee2adf5793cb\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":552.8499636008523},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tip!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It's also possible to get an external preview link for a specific page (not just the home page for the channel). Specific page links are available when you click on the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Page menu \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"under the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Info \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"item.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":31170,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8b9133f9-e852-48d3-bd4b-757036a2afc4/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8b9133f9-e852-48d3-bd4b-757036a2afc4/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture5.png\",\"name\":\"Picture5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8b9133f9-e852-48d3-bd4b-757036a2afc4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":334,\"height\":600},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
